description: Retrieves a list of traces specified by ID. Each trace is a collection of segment documents that originates from a single request. Use GetTraceSummaries to get a list of trace IDs.

parameters.name: TraceIds
parameters.description: Specify the trace IDs of requests for which to retrieve segments. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Traces
nested_items.description: Full traces for the specified requests.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the request that generated the trace's segments and subsegments.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The length of time in seconds between the start time of the root segment and the end time of the last segment that completed.

nested_items.name: LimitExceeded
nested_items.description: LimitExceeded is set to true when the trace has exceeded the Trace document size limit. For more information about this limit and other X-Ray limits and quotas, see Amazon Web Services X-Ray endpoints and quotas.

nested_items.name: Segments
nested_items.description: Segment documents for the segments and subsegments that comprise the trace.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedTraceIds
nested_items.description: Trace IDs of requests that haven't been processed.
